evening.name: Evening notifications
evening.title: GameLife
messages: Every achievement counts! What milestones did you hit today?
Power up your progress by logging today's adventures now!
Your journey matters! Document today's chapters in the app.
Boost your score! How did you level up in real life today?
Your life's game is ongoing. Ensure every move is tracked. Log now!
Remember, every small activity can earn you points. Did you add yours?
Chase those leaderboards! Make sure to input today's experiences.
Every quest and challenge today brings growth. Have you updated the app?
Jot down your journey! What were today's highs and lows?
Life's a game, and every day is a new turn. Ensure you've played yours by logging in.
Another day, another quest! Make sure to capture all your adventures.
Gathered any power-ups or achievements today? Don't let them slip away, note them!
Your legacy is built one day at a time. Have you logged today's story?
Epic moments await! What epic tales from today will you share in the app?
Score big by noting down your daily wins. Have you checked in yet?

message.half-time: You have half the time left to complete the quest[s]: {}
message.last-time: The following quest[s] are due tomorrow: {}, so hurry up and finish them!
message.today-time: The following quest[s] are finished today: {}, hurry up and finish them!

in-app.popup-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.

texts.1: Press this button to go to the activities page
texts.2: Here you are on the page of adding activity, you have to enter activities that you have done in real life!
texts.3: Start by choosing an activity (you can use the categories or research to find what you want)
texts.4: You can add an activity that you have already done, noting the time and duration of it ...
texts.5: Or you can launch a timer to start the activity by pressing the "Start button now "

texts.1: Support here to go to the quest page
texts.2: Pressing the + button to create a new quest
texts.3: Fill in the requested information, such as the title, activities to be carried out, duration etc

texts.1: Start by going to the shop
texts.2: The Ox are the currency of the game, you can win them by looking at ads, by making quests, successes etc
texts.3: Here you can exchange them for what you want, a specific item (among 3 proposed, which change every day), or a trunk to have a random item

texts.1: Start by going to your profile
texts.2: Here you can see your avatar, click on it to open your inventory
texts.3: You can equip an item by pressing on it, or sell it to win ox

texts.1: In this widget you can see your connected friends ...
texts.2: Click on this button to go to the friends page
texts.3: At the bottom right of this page you have a button to add a friend
texts.not-connected: You must be connected to the internet to do this mission, please connect and try again.

loading-error-message.userdata-not-saved: User data could not be saved

server.alert-tokenexpired-message: The application will close, please restart it.
server.alert-aderror-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.
server.alert-aderror-nomore-message: There are no more ads available. Try again tomorrow!
server.alert-adempty-message: You have no more ads available for today.
server.alert-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.

onboarding.page1: Hi, welcome to GameLife, I'm Zap, your guide!
onboarding.page2: The aim of this app is simple : turn your life into a game !
onboarding.page3: When you do an activity in the real world, sport, music, homework, you'll note it down in the application.
onboarding.page4: You'll earn experience and rewards, and you'll be able to track your progress over time!
onboarding.page5: Tips : Are you lost? Click on the info button at the top right for help!
onboarding.page6: All you have to do is sign up and off you go!
onboarding.test-caution-message:
Test version:

Risk of bugs and instability.
Accounts are independent of the main version.
Data may be deleted.

Help us improve the app and earn rewards for every bug found!
onboarding.test-caution-redirect: Come to the Discord to find out more!

conditions.St: Wait for level {} with the statistic "{}"

achievements.popup-global-text: {}% of the players have unlocked this achievement
achievements.alert-achievement-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.

tuto.1: This is the success page. Discover all the ones you've already achieved, as well as others that are patiently waiting to be revealed.

activity.title-not-past: This activity has not yet been completed
activity.title-before-limit: This activity was added more than 48 hours after its completion. It therefore does not earn experience and does not count towards quests.
activity.alert-remove-message: Are you sure you want to eliminate this activity?
activity.alert-wrongtiming-message: Only one activity can be done at a time. This allows you to be more present and more efficient.
activity.alert-needconfirmation-message: Are you sure you want to modify this activity? Its experience will be deleted.
activity.alert-alreadyexist-message: An error has occurred: it seems that this activity has already been added.
activity.alert-tooearly-message: You can't add an activity that starts before the year 2000.
activity.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
activity.alert-error-not-exist-message: This activity doesn't seem to exist, try again later.
activity.alert-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.
activity.timer-friends: Friends doing the same activity at the same time!
activity.timer-music: Zap music will help you focus
activity.timeralert-cancel-message: Are you sure you want to cancel this activity?
activity.timeralert-tooshort-message: You cannot add an activity of less than 5 minutes
activity.display-fail-text: We're sorry but adding the activity failed (status: {})

tuto.1: You can filter activities by category: {}
tuto.2: You can select an activity here to open the activity panel
tuto.3: You can choose to add an activity you've done or plan to do later, or you can set a timer to start the activity now
tuto.4: You can click on this component to define the start and duration of the activity
tuto.5: Here you can see the experience you'll gain by doing this activity
tuto.6: You can add a comment to your activity, for example, to record your feelings or to note important information

home.chart-today-notmuch: Add an activity today to display the graphics
home.container-skills-empty: No skills yet, do one and it will appear here !
home.alert-maintenance-message:
The servers are in maintenance, you can access the application, but online features are temporarily disabled.

Thank you for your patience, everything will come back to normal in a few minutes!
home.alert-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.
home.alert-update-message: An update of the application is available
home.alert-newversion-message: You're on the next GameLife update, this popup will be removed when the stores release it
home.alert-exit-text: Do you want to leave the application?
home.alert-dateerror-text:
It seems that you have changed the date, perhaps in order to cheat?

I count on you to put the right date, I hope it will not happen again!

login.page-text: Ready to dominate your daily life? Join our community and take control of your future!
login.input-cgu-text: I have read and agree to the %terms and conditions%.

tuto.1: This is your profile, you can change your personal information here

tuto.bug: Please provide as many details on the nature of the bug as well as in the conditions in which it appeared (Android/iOS? Connected to the Internet or not? Smartphone or emulator brand?)

You can win codes by:

	- Finding codes in our Tiktok and Youtube videos
	- Winning a contest on Instagram or X

help.dailyDeals: You can spend your Ox here to buy items, which you can equip in your profile - the offers change every day!
help.iap1: Here, you can buy Ox with real money, which has several benefits
help.iap2: First of all, you're helping this project to come to life and you're contributing to the redesign of the avatars and the application
help.iap3: Secondly, you can buy items for your avatar. They're not in their final version, don't worry!
help.iap4: But if you buy them now, you'll be able to resell them at double the price when the new avatars arrive!
help.iap5: This is a way to thank you for trusting us from the start!
help.iap6: By the way, by paying, you also gain access to ZapGPT which is a chatbot which allows you to add lots of activities at once
help.randomChests: In this category you can buy chests in which there is a random item, the rare the chest, the more likely you have a quality item!
help.randomChests-common: For the common chest, there is a strong chance of obtaining an object of common rarity (90%), a probability of 9% for a rare object, 0.99% for an epic object and only 0.01% for alegendary object.
help.randomChests-rare: With regard to the rare chest, the chances of obtaining a common object are 20%, 75% for a rare object, 4.5% for an epic object and 0.5% for a legendary object.
help.randomChests-epic: As for the epic chest, it offers 29% chance of obtaining a rare object, 70% for an epic object and 1% for a legendary object;There is no chance to find a common object there.
help.targetedChests: You can buy targeted chests, in which you are sure you have an item in the category you have chosen!
help.targetedChests-common: In the common chest, the chances of obtaining an object of common rarity are extremely high at 99%, followed by 0.9% for a rare object and 0.1% for an epic object;It should be noted that there is no chance of finding a legendary object there.
help.targetedChests-rare: By opening the rare chest, you have 27% chance of obtaining a common object, 70% for a rare object, 2.9% for an epic object and a thin chance of 0.1% for a legendary object.
help.targetedChests-epic: As for the epic chest, it does not contain common objects and offers 30% chance of obtaining a rare object, 65% for an epic object, and a significant probability of 5% for a legendary object.
help.dyes: Finally you can modify items that you already have, it costs less than buying new ones!

skill.title: Skill
skill.text-no-xp: This activity does not earn experience

skills.title: My skills
skills.text-empty: Add an activity, the associated skills will appear here

descriptions.int: Intelligence is a very broad statistic, as soon as you use your brain, you train it and therefore gain intelligence points. The main skills to gain intelligence are school work and thinking work.
descriptions.soc: Social competence is a skill that increases when you do activities with other people. For example, team sports or going out with friends.
descriptions.for: Strength is a fairly simple statistic, it increases by doing skills that require it, like bodybuilding, sports or physical jobs for example!
descriptions.sta: Stamina is probably the skill that you will improve the fastest! This is a key statistic that improves in almost all sports!
descriptions.agi: Agility is probably the longest statistic to build, it is not often required and improves slowly, the best ways to increase your agility are actis like stretching or yoga.
descriptions.dex: Dexterity is the agility of the fingers, so it improves a lot on precision quests, writing quests on a computer or even with musical instruments.

todo.title: My list
todo.error-title-exists: A todo with this title already exists
todo.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
todo.alert-remtodo-message: Are you sure you want to delete this todo?
todo.alert-remtask-message: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
todo.alert-taskslimit-text: You can't add more than 20 tasks to this todo
todo.alert-back-message: Would you like to return to the home page? Unsaved changes will be lost.

tuto.1: Here you can set the deadline for your todo
tuto.2: You can also add sub-todoes to your main todo, to organize yourself better.
tuto.3: Finally, you can add a comment to your todo, for example, to note your feelings or to record important information.

todoes.alert-todoeslimit-message: You have reached the limit of todoes, please delete some of them to add more.

quest.title: My quest
quest.text-hint-select: Press and hold to select the column
quest.text-hint-frequency: How often do you want to do your activities?

input-errors.title-exists: A quest with this title already exists
input-errors.skills-empty: You must add at least one activity
input-errors.schedule-empty: You must select the days on which you want to do this quest

quest.alert-remquest-message: Are you sure you want to delete this quest?
quest.alert-back-message: Would you like to return to the home page? Unsaved changes will be lost.

tuto.1: Here you can set the deadline for your quest, or its frequency if it's a recurring one
tuto.2: You can link your quest to an activity, which will allow you to gain experience by completing it.
tuto.3: Finally, you can add a comment to your quest, for example, to note your feelings or to record important information.

tuto.1: Here you define the deadline for your quest, or its frequency if it's a recurring one.
tuto.2: You can link your quest to an activity, which will allow you to gain experience by completing it.
tuto.3: Finally, you can add a comment to your quest, for example, to record your feelings or to note important information.

quests.alert-questslimit-message: You have reached the limit of quests, please delete some of them to add more.

tuto.1: These are the quests! Missions you can give yourself to help motivate you.
tuto.2: If you want to add one, just click on the button here!
tuto.3: Under each quest, you'll see circles. They can have several colours, here are their meanings:
tuto.4: Red: the quest has not been completed.  Pink: it's happening today.  Purple: other days
tuto.5: Oh yes! If you click on a quest, you can see its details!
tuto.6: What are you waiting for? Go for it! If you need help, you can click on the info button and I'll come to you!

daily-quest.label-finished: Quest for the day made, well done!
daily-quest.alert-claim-error-message: An error has occurred, please try again later.

help.1: Here are the daily quests, complete the required activity to earn rewards!
help.2: Every day a list of activities tailored for you is made available.
help.3: Choose an activity from the list and complete it for 15 minutes to validate your quest.
help.4: If you want to see a list of all possible rewards, click on the arrow here!

wait.wait-internet-text:
The GameLife server is down.

Check your Internet connection or try again later!

If the problem persists, contact us on Discord or by e-mail, which you'll find on our website:
wait.wait-maintenance-text: The servers are currently in maintenance, come back later!
wait.wait-email-text:
An email has been sent to you to authorize your device to connect.

The email may be sent after a few minutes, check your spam.

main.home-greetings: Hello again {}! Welcome to GameLife, let me show you the application!
main.home: Here you are on the menu, where you'll find general information about GameLife and your profile
main.home-next: Click on the shiny icon to go to the calendar
main.calendar: This is the calendar, it contains all the activities you've done
main.calendar-next: Next click: the quests! (the shiny icon at the bottom of the screen)
main.quest: This is the quests page, which will help to motivate you and get you into the habit of doing things. You can click on the 'i's for more information!
main.quest-next: Direction: your avatar (the shiny icon at the top right of the screen)
main.avatar: There you are! Well, your avatar. You can customise it by earning or buying equipment
main.shop: Equipment you can buy here, in the shop! You'll find items for your avatar, chests and dyes!
main.shop-next: And most importantly, click on the big pink button at the bottom!
main.activity: This is where you can add your activities! All you have to do is choose an activity and start playing!
main.home-final: Your GameLife adventure starts now! A world full of challenges and rewards is waiting for you, so don't wait any longer and go for it!

zap-gpt.title2: Zap will add activities for you
instructions: - Descriptions as clear and simple as possible
- Be clear about the activities, their start dates and times, and their duration.
- Example: I did basketball Monday 11, Wednesday and Friday from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m.
zap-gpt.no-remaining-text: You have reached the limit, to add more come from tomorrow
zap-gpt.not-buyed-text1:
You have not unlocked access to Zapgpt!

Zapgpt is a tool that allows you to add several activities both thanks to a short description.
zap-gpt.not-buyed-text2: To unlock it, buy any OX pack in the store.
zap-gpt.not-connected-text: The application could not connect to Zapgpt, check your internet connection or try again later.
zap-gpt.no-activities-text: No activity could be added, they ride already existing or activities are wrong.

errors.limit-reached: You have reached the use limit for today
